body.section:
The procedure to make changes to jobs created by default in is to edit the model file, my_cloud/config/freezer/jobs.yml and then re-run the _freezer-manage-jobs.yml playbook. (Note that the backup/restore component is called "Freezer" so you may see commands by that name.)
Open jobs.yml in an editor, then change and save the file:cd ~/helion nano my_cloud/config/freezer/jobs.yml
Commit the file to the local git repository:git add -A git commit -m "Backup job changes"
Next, run the configuration processor followed by the ready-deployment playbooks:cd ~/helion/hos/ansible/ ansible-playbook -i hosts/localhost config-processor-run.yml ansible-playbook -i hosts/localhost ready-deployment.yml
Run _freezer_manage_jobs.yml:cd ~/scratch/ansible/next/hos/ansible ansible-playbook -i hosts/verb_hosts _freezer_manage_jobs.yml
